Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love. Mother Teresa Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. Oscar Wilde
A loving heart is the truest wisdom. Charles Dickens4
There is no remedy for love but to love more. Henry David Thoreau
Let all that you do be done in love. 1 Corinthians 16:14
And above all these put on love, which binds everything together in perfect harmony. Colossians 3:14
And now these three remain faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love. 1 Corinthians 13:13
Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do. David Wilkerson
Being loved is life\'s second greatest blessing; loving is the greatest. Jack Hyles
Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul. Saint Augustine
The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now. Rick Warren
How do you spell \'love\'? – Piglet \"You don\'t spell it, you feel it.\" Pooh
Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within. James Baldwin
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope. Maya Angelou
A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you. Elbert Hubbard
Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that. Martin Luther King Jr
Be devoted to one another in love. Honor one another above yourselves. Romans 12.10
There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear 1 John 4:18
Love is putting someone else’s needs before yours. Olaf
